it.polimi.ingsw.controller.validator

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdrenalinicGrabValidator, AdrenalinicShotValidator, BaseActionValidator, FinalFrenzyValidator

    public interface Validator
    This interface define the methods to get the action that players can perform in different situation and all the possible targets of those actions
    Author:
    Federico Innocente

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Square> availableGrab(Controller controller)
      Calculate all possible squares that can be grab by the current player in only one grab action, both basic and spawn square.
      java.util.List<Square> availableMoves(Controller controller)
      Calculate all possible destination of a move action performed by the current player
      static java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> availableToFireWeapons(Player player)
      Find all the weapons of the player that can correctly fire.
      boolean[] getUsableActions(Controller controller)
      Calculate which actions the current player can perform in his round

    • Method Detail

      • availableMoves

        java.util.List<Square> availableMoves(Controller controller)
        Calculate all possible destination of a move action performed by the current player
        Parameters:
        controller - is teh controller of the game, with all the information about the map and the game itself
        Returns:
        is a list of the possible destination of a move action performed by the current player

      • availableGrab

        java.util.List<Square> availableGrab(Controller controller)
        Calculate all possible squares that can be grab by the current player in only one grab action, both basic and spawn square. Basic square with no ammo tile and empty spawn square or with not correctly payable weapons will not be count
        Parameters:
        controller - is the controller of the game, with all the information about the map and the game itself
        Returns:
        a list of all possible destination of a correct

      • availableToFireWeapons

        static java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> availableToFireWeapons(Player player)
        Find all the weapons of the player that can correctly fire. Weapons must be load and be able to perform correctly at least one payable effect.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who's weapon are searched
        Returns:
        a list of all the player's weapon that can correctly fire

      • getUsableActions

        boolean[] getUsableActions(Controller controller)
        Calculate which actions the current player can perform in his round
        Parameters:
        controller - is the controller of the game, with all the information about the map and the game state
        Returns:
        a boolean vector, which true value define the usability of an action according with the following codification: 0 - move action 1 - grab action 2 - shot action
